items.headline: Elon Musk gets a win in the long-running legal battle over his Tesla pay

items.headline: They’re in their 60s and still paying off student loans. College debt in America now lasts a lifetime.
items.summary_en: “I just keep hoping that it will just magically go away or I’ll just die”: A growing feature of the nation’s $1.7 trillion student-debt crisis is Americans living with student loans for their entire adult lives.
